draft:
SUBJECT: Oluwayemisi - congrats on announcement

Hi Oluwayemisi,

I saw the news about SeamlessHR's announcement - "SeamlessHR's Blueprint for FCSSIP 25 Implementation - SeamlessHR". Congratulations!

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer. I recently built Crewmanage HR System - HR management with scheduling, payroll, workflow automation, RBAC

Tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB, Role-based access | Scale: Enterprise HR features

Would you be open to a brief chat if SeamlessHR ever needs freelance development support?

Best regards,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer
davidariyo109@gmail.com | (+234) 903-6184-863
Portfolio: davidariyo.onrender.com
